entry.title: All apologies
entry.content: What else should I be 还能做什么 All apologies. 只能道歉啦 What else should I say 还能说什么 Everyone is gay 都TM是基 (都TM欢腾) What else should I write 还能写什么？ I don't have the right 没这屌权利 What else should I be 还能做什么 All apologies 只能道歉啦 In the sun 阳光下 In the sun I feel as one 阳光下，我如此孤独 In the sun 阳光下 In the sun 阳光下 Married 结婚了 Buried 埋葬了 I wish I was like you 想像你一样 Easily amused 轻易被逗乐 Find my nest of salt 去找点乐子 Everything is my fault 都TM赖我 I'll take all the blame 这锅我背了 Aqua seafoam shame 绿海泡惭愧 Sunburn with freezeburn 冰火两重天 Choking on the ashes of her enemy 敌骸中窒息 In the sun 阳光下 In the sun I feel as one 阳光下，我如此孤独 In the sun 阳光下 In the sun 阳光下 Married 结婚了 Buried 埋葬了 Married 结婚了 Buried 埋葬了 Yeah, yeah yeah yeah 噢，噢，噢，噢！ All in all is all we are.......... 总之这就是我们啊······ PS：“Aqua seafoam shame”到底是什么鬼啊。。。。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
